name: Garupa Tower Battle (REMAKE)
description: This a recreation of the Garupa Tower Battle game from the JP April Fools 2020 event in BanG Dream! This is not a 100% faithful recreation, and the physics are not an exact replica of the physics of the original game.  Unlike the original, this remake is solely single-player, but I may add online multiplayer if people want it. Also, there are no sound effects as the assets were unfortunately removed from the game before I had a chance to download them.
